content:
### Enhanced nodes

* [Airtable:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.airtable/index.md) Added Bulk Size option to all Operations.
* [Box:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.box.md) Added Share operation to File and Folder resources.
* [Salesforce:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.salesforce.md) Added Last Name field to Update operation on Contact resource.
* [Zoho CRM:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.zohocrm.md) Added Account, Contact, Deal, Invoice, Product, Purchase, Quote, Sales Order, and Vendor resources.
